name: People are more powerful
title: As much as possible
info: The more aircraft you have, the better the overall aircraft capacity, and the 5% increase in the properties of each aircraft.

title: Singles
info: When only owning one aircraft, the aircraft's capacity increases by 200%

title: meteor

name: sacrifice spirit
title: restore
info: When the owned aircraft was destroyed, it immediately started to completely restore the health of other aircraft.

name: Trap delay
title: delay
info: It is not so easy to re-emerge the organ trap\ will only appear once after a delay of 1 minute

info: The size of bullets fired by enemy missiles is reduced by 30%.
